thread.section_title: ProBikeKit (Australia) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProBikeKit (Australia) | probikekit.com.au
thread.title: MK

author: MK
title: MK
text:
I was a little hesitant to order from pbk at first, given all the negative reviews, but couldn't stop myself from ordering a pair of Oakley Flak 2.0 XL with Prizm Road lenses due to the price. Pbk offered the cheapest on the market after their current 12% discount promotion, at AUD 156.42. The item was ordered on the 12th of Feb and the estimated delivery date was 27th Feb, but I received the sunnies today on the 23rd itself. The product looks good and the Oakleys are genuine (after doing the standard authenticity checks).
Can't really fault this seller, and giving it a top rating for its price.
